Jogo competitivo online que infelizmente tem muitos xiters, mas, caso pegue um alto nível e tiver Prime Account irá ver que fica mais difícil encontrar os xiters.
Recomendo para quem é brasileiro dar uma olhada na Gamers Club, no qual faz uma itegração com o game e permite jogar partida criadas no servidor deles, vale muito a pena.
Esse jogo é muito bom kkk minha namorada me largou pq eu nao parava de jogar kkkkk recomendo

just a great game to play with friends. sbmm is a bust but im a competitive person at heart. I`m up for any fight but will 90/10 lose. Just have fun!

单纯的喜欢CS，喜欢和朋友一起玩，回忆以前泡网吧彻夜打CS的感觉，是情怀

Too many cheaters.
Still too many cheaters. Nearly every  game 1-5 people on the enemy team toggles because they are losing too hard early on. They stop cheating when they have 14 or 15 rounds and become utter fuckign garbage toggles back on last round to win or tie it's the same fucking story every time, these toxic kids that play this game can't handle losing at all. Walls, aim lock, bhop scripts the whole shebang every time.

Valve needs to be allowed to look through people computers and ban everyone asap when they start their game with a cheat client on. This game is beyond trash at this point.

I mean there's not a lot of games that I have played for over 1 or 2 hundred hours so In my opinion it speaks volumes that this game has kept me entertained almost daily for the past 4 years. 1200 hours later, although i'm still silver 2 this game, simple as it is, slaps. If you have a regular squad to play with or even just solo queuing I would recommend giving it a download. I suggest prime matchmaking so you're not stuck getting fricked over by hackers though.
ok game needs new content though to survive
